12 ManipPrototype::ManipPrototype(const char* s_topic, int sq_size, const char* p_topic, int pq_size)
13  : it_(nh_)
14 {
15  sub_ = it_.subscribe(s_topic,sq_size,&ManipPrototype::callback,this);
16  pub_ = it_.advertise(p_topic,pq_size);
17 }

39 void Manip::callback(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg)
40 {
41  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr;
42 
43  try
44  {
45  cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg,"");
46  }
47  catch(cv_bridge::Exception& e)
48  {
49  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge exception: %s\n", e.what());
50  return;
51  }
52 
53  manipulate(cv_ptr->image);
54 
55  //check if manipulate changed image encoding
56  if(cv_ptr->image.channels() == 1)
57  {
58  cv_ptr->encoding = "mono8";
59  }
60  else if(cv_ptr->image.channels() == 3)
61  {
62  cv_ptr->encoding = "bgr8";
63  }
64 
65  pub_.publish(cv_ptr->toImageMsg());
66 
67  return;
68 }
69 
70 void Manip::manipulate(cv::Mat& image)
71 {
72  cv::cvtColor(image, image, cv::COLOR_BGR2GRAY); // simple grayscale
73  return;
74 }

82 ImgSegmentSimple::ImgSegmentSimple(const char* s_topic, int sq_size, const char* p_topic, int pq_size)
83  : Manip(s_topic, sq_size, p_topic, pq_size)
84 {
85  roi_.x = 0;
86  roi_.y = 0;
87  roi_.width = 0;
88  roi_.height = 0;
89 
90  srv_ = nh_.advertiseService("rectangle/dimensions",&ImgSegmentSimple::set_dim,this);
91 }
92 
93 void ImgSegmentSimple::manipulate(cv::Mat& image)
94 {
95  if(((roi_.x + roi_.width)>image.cols) || ((roi_.y + roi_.height)>image.rows))
96  ROS_INFO("Rectangle dimensions too large for image container.\n");
97  else if(roi_.area() == 0)
98  ; //do nothing to the image
99  else
100  image = image(roi_); // crop image according to roi dimensions
101  return;
102 }
103 
104 bool ImgSegmentSimple::set_dim(remote_robotics::rect_dims::Request& req, remote_robotics::rect_dims::Response& res)
105 {
106  ROS_INFO("request x=%d, y=%d, width=%d, height=%d\n",req.X,req.Y,req.WIDTH,req.HEIGHT);
107  if((req.X<0) || (req.Y<0) || (req.WIDTH<0) || (req.HEIGHT<0))
108  {
109  res.RESPONSE = std::string("ERROR: No negative coordinates allowed.");
110  return true;
111  }
112  roi_.x = req.X;
113  roi_.y = req.Y;
114  roi_.width = req.WIDTH;
115  roi_.height = req.HEIGHT;
116 
117  res.RESPONSE = std::string("OK");
118 
119  return true;
120 }

172 void ImgSegmentSpecial::manipulate(cv::Mat& image)
173 {
174  if((motor_number >= 0) && (motor_number <= 23))
175  image = image(motor_rack_[motor_number]);
176  return;
177 }
178 
179 void ImgSegmentSpecial::callback(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg)
180 {
181  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr;
182  remote_robotics::MotorImg mi_msg;
183 
184  try
185  {
186  cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg,"");
187  }
188  catch(cv_bridge::Exception& e)
189  {
190  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge exception: %s\n", e.what());
191  return;
192  }
193 
194  manipulate(cv_ptr->image);
195 
196  //check if manipulate changed image encoding
197  if(cv_ptr->image.channels() == 1)
198  {
199  cv_ptr->encoding = "mono8";
200  }
201  else if(cv_ptr->image.channels() == 3)
202  {
203  cv_ptr->encoding = "bgr8";
204  }
205  mi_msg.IMG = *cv_ptr->toImageMsg();
206  mi_msg.INDEX = motor_number;
207 
208  pub_.publish(mi_msg);
209 
210  return;
211 }
212 bool ImgSegmentSpecial::set_dim_by_index(remote_robotics::motor_idx::Request& req, remote_robotics::motor_idx::Response& res)
213 {
214  ROS_INFO("request: motor index=%d\n",req.INDEX);
215  if((req.INDEX<0)||(req.INDEX>23))
216  {
217  res.RESPONSE = std::string("ERROR: WRONG MOTOR INDEX");
218  }
219  else
220  {
221  motor_number = req.INDEX;
222  //roi_ = motor_rack_[motor_number];
223  res.RESPONSE = std::string("OK");
224  }
225 
226  return true;
227 }

234 BinaryImg::BinaryImg(const char* s_topic, int sq_size, int pq_size)
235  : Manip(s_topic,sq_size,"image/binary",pq_size){};
236 
237 void BinaryImg::manipulate(cv::Mat& image)
238 {
239 
240  cv::Mat channels[3];
241 
242  cv::split(image,channels);
243 
244  cv::subtract(channels[2],channels[1],image);
245 
246  cv::threshold(image,image,35,255,cv::THRESH_BINARY);
247 
248  return;
249 }
